column4: i've got a display problem, and no words can describe it. have a look at this screen shot https://picasaweb.google.com/114384552799901223449/THIS_IS_INSANEDesktopScreenshot?authkey=Gv1sRgCNuTmq_s35irZg&feat=directlink, pay attention to the launcher. and windows aren't affected unless they're fullscreen
it just logged me out, I logged back in, and it fixed itself... WTF?!
